text:
The daemontools patch posted at

	http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/contrib/patches/1.3/daemontools.patch

no longer applies cleanly to 1.3.24. Please download the new patch from

	http://lizzy.dyndns.org/~jos/apache-1.3.24-daemontools.patch

and install it as

http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/contrib/patches/1.3/apache-1.3.24-daemontools.patch

and remove the old patch. Thanks.

Jos
creator: jos@catnook.com
